articles.author: Azarrah Karrim
articles.title: Ukrainian-SA dancer hopes to draw attention to efforts to stop Russian war - News24
articles.description: A Ukrainian-South African dance teacher based in Johannesburg wants to raise awareness of the war in Ukraine by bringing attention to the efforts of the Ukrainian Association of South Africa to end the conflict.
articles.content: • A dance teacher in Johannesburg who originally hails from Ukraine wants to draw attention to the efforts of the Ukrainian Association of South Africa to end the Russian war in Ukraine.
